# Android TWA Packaging for NARC EYE

This directory contains the Trusted Web Activity (TWA) configuration for packaging the NARC EYE PWA as an Android APK.

## Overview

The TWA configuration is automatically synced from the PWA metadata in:
- `frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest` (app name, colors, icons, start URL)
- `frontend/index.html` (title, theme color, apple touch icon)

**Do not manually edit `twa-manifest.json`** - it is generated by the sync script.

## Configuration

### Target URL

The `host` field in `twa-manifest.json` determines which URL the Android app will load. Update this to point to your deployed canister:
